tr_quotes.quote: Kişi arkadaşları ile ölçülür
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Ali (r.a.)

tr_quotes.quote: Arkadaşlığın kelimelere ihtiyacı yoktur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Arkadaşlığın olduğu yerde zenginlik vardır.
tr_quotes.author: Muccius Plautus

tr_quotes.quote: Arkadaşlığın dili, kelimeler değil, anlamlardır.
tr_quotes.author: Henry Thoreau

tr_quotes.quote: Arkadaşlığın tohumunu ekin, bir buket mutluluk biçin.
tr_quotes.author: Lois Kaufman

tr_quotes.quote: Dostluk büyük bir şey değildir. Bir milyon küçük şeydir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bir yolculuk en iyi mesafeler ile değil, arkadaşlar ile ölçülür.
tr_quotes.author: Tim Cahill

tr_quotes.quote: Tanımadıklarımız, henüz tanışmadığımız arkadaşlarımızdır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Yeni arkadaşlar için en kısa yol bir gülümsemedir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Dostluk, birbiri hakkında hüküm vermek demek değildir. Dostluk, inanmak demektir.
tr_quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

tr_quotes.quote: Sadık bir arkadaş on bin akrabaya bedeldir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Arkadaşlık aşktan daha zordur. Çünkü daha uzun sürer.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Gerçek arkadaşlık iki bedende bir ruhtur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Elinde hava, ışık ve dost sevgisi kaldıysa üzüntü çekme.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İyi dostu olanın aynaya gereksinimi yoktur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kusursuz arkadaş aramak, dost edinmeyi istememek demektir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Dost acı söyleyen değildir. Acıyı tatlı söyleyebilendir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: En büyük iyilik, arkadaşına ikramda bulunmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kardeş, dost olmayabilir ama dost, her zaman kardeştir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Acıların bölüşülmesi değil, sevinçlerin bölüşülmesidir dostluğu yaratan.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Arkadaşınızın evinize sık sık gidin, çünkü kullanılmayan yolu çalılar bürür.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Gerçek dostlar yıldızlar gibidir karanlık çökünce ortaya çıkarlar.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Neredesin, yanan alnımı müşfik avuçlarında dinlendirecek meçhul arkadaş.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İyi arkadaş, yanında yüksek sesle konuşup düşünebileceğin insandır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Adı, rengi, türü, ne olursa olsun, her gerçek dost, kişinin öbür yarısıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Hakiki arkadaşlık, sıhhatten farksızdır, kıymeti, ancak elden gittikten sonra anlaşılır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: En iyi arkadaş, kendisinden başkasına, arkadaşlarını muhtaç etmeyendir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Arkadaşlık kuvvetli bir bağdır. Paraya ihtiyaç olunca başvurulmazsa ömür boyu sürer.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Tanrım, beni dostlarıma karşı koru, kendimi düşmanlarıma karşı korurum.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İyi insanlarla arkadaş olunuz. Kötü kimseyle arkadaşlık etmektense, yalnız olmak evladır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Dostların sıkıntıda iken onları mutlu oldukları zamankinden daha çok ara.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Birbirimizin küçük kusurlarını hoş görmezsek arkadaşlıktan bir şey anlayamayız.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Gerçek arkadaşı olmamak, yalnızlığın en kötüsüdür. İyi ki varsın ve hep yanımdasın can dostum.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bir arkadaşınız, yemiş bahçesini geziyorsa, dalgın görünmeniz en büyük nezakettir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Olgun bir adamı dost edinmek isterseniz eleştirin, basit bir kimseyi dost edinmek isterseniz övün.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Yurdun yuvasından ayrılanlar garip değil aslında, garip sadık dosttan mahrum kalandır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Ben arkadaş gözü göremezsem bu gözlerim nemdir benim. Sesin duymazsam kalbim gamdır benim.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Dostlarımla beraber olduğum zaman yalnız değilim. O dakikadan sonra da iki kişi değiliz.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kilometrelerce uzaklıklara gizlenmiş olsa da dostluğumuz aynı gökyüzünü paylaştığımız sürece dostuz.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kaybetmeyi göze alamayacak kadar az arkadaşım var. Onlar milyonlarca yıldızlar arasında benim güneşim.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Güller, laleler, bütün çiçekler solar. Çelik ve demir kırılır ama sağlam arkadaşlık ne solar ne de kırılır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Elinde hava, ışık ve dost sevgisi kaldıysa üzüntü çekme. Çünkü dostlar acıları da sevinçleri de paylaşırlar.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Dostluk, toprak bir maşrapa gibidir, önemsiz bir nedenden birdenbire kırılır ve bir daha kullanılmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Ana ve babanızı kader, arkadaşımızı kendimiz seçeriz. O yüzden arkadaşlarımız bizim en candan seçimlerimizdir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Dostluk, mantar yemeği gibidir. Zehirli veya zehirsiz olup olmadığı ancak yendikten sonra belli olur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Hayat; yaşamayı, mutluluk; gülümsemeyi, sevgi; hak etmeyi, vefa; hatırlamayı, dostluk; paylaşmayı bilen için vardır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: En büyük servetin nedir bilir misin? Gülen bir arkadaş, iyi hissettiren bir dost ve vücudundaki sıhhat…
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Gerçek dost yanlış yaptığında seni uyaran, sonrasında ise koruyan kişidir. Yaptığın yanlışı herkese duyuran değil.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Arkadaş, hem iyi görünen, hem iyi olan insandır; iyi görünen ama iyi olmayan insan ise dost görünür, ama dost değildir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sıradan bir arkadaş, sizi asla ağlarken görmez. Gerçek arkadaşın omuzları, sizin gözyaşlarınızdan sırılsıklam olmuştur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Unutmayın, hiçbir zaman arkadaş kaybetmezsiniz. Sadece kimlerin gerçek arkadaşlarınız olduğunu keşfedersiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer herkes arkadaş sandığı kimselerin bir de kendi arkasından söylemiş olduklarını duysaydı, dünyada arkadaşlık kalmazdı.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bir insana tamamen güvendiğinizde iki sonuçtan birini elde edeceğiniz kesindir. Ya yaşam boyu dost, ya hayat boyu bir ders…
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Arkadaşlık ağaca benzer, kurudu mu yeşermez artık. Kalbini kırma dostunun bir daha gönlünü alsan da kalpte leke hep kalır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Biri olmalı varlığını daima bildiğin kendini güvende hissettiğin. Biri olmalı üzülme üzülürüm diyen biri olmalı hayatınızda.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Dostlarınla öyle yaşa ki düşman olduğunda hakkında söyleyecek sözleri olmasın. Düşmanlarınla öyle yaşa ki dost olduğunda yüzün kızarmasın.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Hep zamana yenik düştük esiri olduk anlamsız koşuşturmaların. Ama bir kez adını yüreğimize kazıdığımız dostlarımızı hiçbir zaman unutmadık.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kendinizle arkadaşlık kurabilirseniz asla yalnız kalmazsınız.
tr_quotes.author: Maxwell Maltz

tr_quotes.quote: Dürüst bir cevap, gerçek dostluğun işaretidir.
tr_quotes.author: Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Yukarıya çekmediğiniz müddetçe kimseye tepeden bakmayın.
tr_quotes.author: Jesse Jackson

tr_quotes.quote: Dost, geçmişinizi anlayan, geleceğinize inanan ve sizi olduğunuz gibi kabul edendir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Önümden yürüme; seni takip edemeyebilirim. Arkamdan yürüme; sana önderlik edemeyebilirim. Sadece yanımda yürü ve dostum ol.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Camus

en_quotes.quote: I have learned that friendship isn't about who you've known the longest, it's about who came and never left your side
en_quotes.author: Yolanda Hadid

en_quotes.quote: There is nothing on this earth more to be prized than true friendship
en_quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

en_quotes.quote: One of the most beautiful qualities of true friendship is to understand and to be understood
en_quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

en_quotes.quote: It's the friends you can call up at 4 a.m. that matter
en_quotes.author: Marlene Dietrich

en_quotes.quote: Let us be grateful to people who make us happy, they are the charming gardeners who make our souls blossom
en_quotes.author: Marcel Proust

en_quotes.quote: When the world is so complicated, the simple gift of friendship is within all of our hands
en_quotes.author: Maria Shriver

en_quotes.quote: True friendship ought never to conceal what it thinks
en_quotes.author: St. Jerome

en_quotes.quote: A true friend is the greatest of all blessings, and that which we take the least care of all to acquire
en_quotes.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

en_quotes.quote: Every friendship is different because everyone's personality is different
en_quotes.author: Nargis Fakhri

en_quotes.quote: Remember that the most valuable antiques are dear old friends
en_quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: It is only the great hearted who can be true friends. The mean and cowardly, Can never know what true friendship means
en_quotes.author: Charles Kingsley

en_quotes.quote: Depth of friendship does not depend on length of acquaintance
en_quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

en_quotes.quote: It is not so much our friends' help that helps us, as the confidence of their help
en_quotes.author: Epicurus

en_quotes.quote: A single rose can be my garden... a single friend, my world
en_quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

en_quotes.quote: Yes'm, old friends is always best, 'less you can catch a new one that's fit to make an old one out of
en_quotes.author: Sarah Orne Jewett

en_quotes.quote: Friendship is one mind in two bodies
en_quotes.author: Mencius

en_quotes.quote: The friendship that can cease has never been real
en_quotes.author: St. Jerome

en_quotes.quote: The essence of true friendship is to make allowance for another's little lapses
en_quotes.author: David Storey

en_quotes.quote: My best friend is the one who brings out the best in me
en_quotes.author: Henry Ford

en_quotes.quote: The language of friendship is not words but meanings
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: Friendship needs no words - it is solitude delivered from the anguish of loneliness
en_quotes.author: Dag Hammarskjold

en_quotes.quote: A friend is one who knows you and loves you just the same
en_quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

en_quotes.quote: Sustaining true friendship is a lot more challenging than we give it credit for
en_quotes.author: Mariella Frostrup

en_quotes.quote: Friendship is the source of the greatest pleasures, and without friends even the most agreeable pursuits become tedious
en_quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

en_quotes.quote: Opposition is true friendship
en_quotes.author: William Blake

en_quotes.quote: A friend is someone who gives you total freedom to be yourself
en_quotes.author: Jim Morrison

en_quotes.quote: Friendship is always a sweet responsibility, never an opportunity
en_quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

en_quotes.quote: One loyal friend is worth ten thousand relatives
en_quotes.author: Euripides

en_quotes.quote: Friends... they cherish one another's hopes. They are kind to one another's dreams
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: A man's friendships are one of the best measures of his worth
en_quotes.author: Charles Darwin

en_quotes.quote: A true friend never gets in your way unless you happen to be going down
en_quotes.author: Arnold H. Glasow

en_quotes.quote: A true friend is someone who is there for you when he'd rather be anywhere else
en_quotes.author: Len Wein

en_quotes.quote: Love is the only force capable of transforming an enemy into a friend
en_quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: The only way to have a friend is to be one
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: Be slow to fall into friendship; but when thou art in, continue firm and constant
en_quotes.author: Socrates

en_quotes.quote: Of all possessions a friend is the most precious
en_quotes.author: Herodotus

en_quotes.quote: It is more shameful to distrust our friends than to be deceived by them
en_quotes.author: Confucius

en_quotes.quote: A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out
en_quotes.author: Walter Winchell

en_quotes.quote: If you have one true friend you have more than your share
en_quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

en_quotes.quote: The bird a nest, the spider a web, man friendship
en_quotes.author: William Blake

en_quotes.quote: True friends stab you in the front
en_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

en_quotes.quote: Loyalty and friendship, which is to me the same, created all the wealth that I've ever thought I'd have
en_quotes.author: Ernie Banks

en_quotes.quote: There are no strangers here; Only friends you haven't yet met
en_quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

en_quotes.quote: The most I can do for my friend is simply be his friend
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: A friend is an emotional bond, just like friendship is a human experience
en_quotes.author: Simon Sinek

en_quotes.quote: I have friends in overalls whose friendship I would not swap for the favor of the kings of the world
en_quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

en_quotes.quote: A friendship founded on business is better than a business founded on friendship
en_quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

en_quotes.quote: Friendship is certainly the finest balm for the pangs of disappointed love
en_quotes.author: Jane Austen

en_quotes.quote: Love is flower like; Friendship is like a sheltering tree
en_quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

en_quotes.quote: Never explain - your friends do not need it and your enemies will not believe you anyway
en_quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

en_quotes.quote: A friend may well be reckoned the masterpiece of nature
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: Never contract friendship with a man that is not better than thyself
en_quotes.author: Confucius

en_quotes.quote: A friend to all is a friend to none
en_quotes.author: Aristotle

en_quotes.quote: Lay this unto your breast: Old friends, like old swords, still are trusted best
en_quotes.author: John Webster

en_quotes.quote: I want my friend to miss me as long as I miss him
en_quotes.author: Saint Augustine

en_quotes.quote: Acquaintances we meet, enjoy, and can easily leave behind; but friendship grows deep roots
en_quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: Never do a wrong thing to make a friend or to keep one
en_quotes.author: Robert E. Lee

en_quotes.quote: When the bank asks me about my assets, I include my friendship with Regis Philbin
en_quotes.author: Lou Holtz

en_quotes.quote: Love is the attempt to form a friendship inspired by beauty
en_quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

en_quotes.quote: Friendship is accepting a person with all their qualities - good and bad
en_quotes.author: Mohanlal

en_quotes.quote: Laughter is not at all a bad beginning for a friendship, and it is far the best ending for one
en_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

en_quotes.quote: Remember that a gesture of friendship, no matter how small, is always appreciated
en_quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: Love is blind; friendship closes its eyes
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

en_quotes.quote: Longevity in friendship is very important and one of the keys to the foundation of a happy life
en_quotes.author: Karrueche Tran

en_quotes.quote: Friendship with ones self is all important, because without it one cannot be friends with anyone else in the world
en_quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

en_quotes.quote: Friends are the best to turn to when you're having a rough day
en_quotes.author: Justin Bieber

en_quotes.quote: A friend is a gift you give yourself
en_quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

en_quotes.quote: Never have a companion that casts you in the shade
en_quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

en_quotes.quote: A quarrel between friends, when made up, adds a new tie to friendship
en_quotes.author: Saint Francis de Sales

en_quotes.quote: Let me be very clear: my friendship with my friends ends where the interest of the country begins
en_quotes.author: Rodrigo Duterte

en_quotes.quote: My inspiration are the woman, friendship, and loneliness
en_quotes.author: Enrique Iglesias

en_quotes.quote: Fear makes strangers of people who would be friends
en_quotes.author: Shirley MacLaine

en_quotes.quote: All love that has not friendship for its base, is like a mansion built upon the sand
en_quotes.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

en_quotes.quote: Friendship is a very taxing and arduous form of leisure activity
en_quotes.author: Mortimer Adler

en_quotes.quote: But friendship is the breathing rose, with sweets in every fold
en_quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

en_quotes.quote: Things are never quite as scary when you've got a best friend
en_quotes.author: Bill Watterson

en_quotes.quote: Value your friendship. Value your relationships
en_quotes.author: Barbara Bush

en_quotes.quote: Friendship often ends in love, but love in friendship - never
en_quotes.author: Albert Camus

en_quotes.quote: All I required to be happy was friendship and people I could admire
en_quotes.author: Christian Dior

en_quotes.quote: Be courteous to all, but intimate with few, and let those few be well tried before you give them your confidence
en_quotes.author: George Washington

en_quotes.quote: Friendship is a sheltering tree
en_quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

en_quotes.quote: As iron sharpens iron, so a friend sharpens a friend
en_quotes.author: King Solomon

en_quotes.quote: He has no enemies, but is intensely disliked by his friends
en_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

en_quotes.quote: Eros will have naked bodies; Friendship naked personalities
en_quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

en_quotes.quote: My friends are my estate
en_quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

en_quotes.quote: There is no friendship, no love, like that of the parent for the child
en_quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

en_quotes.quote: Life has no blessing like a prudent friend
en_quotes.author: Euripides

en_quotes.quote: Friendship is the most important thing of all
en_quotes.author: Kim Philby

en_quotes.quote: There is a scarcity of friendship, but not of friends
en_quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

en_quotes.quote: It takes a long time to grow an old friend
en_quotes.author: John Leonard

en_quotes.quote: Friendship is a wildly underrated medication
en_quotes.author: Anna Deavere Smith

en_quotes.quote: Without wearing any mask we are conscious of, we have a special face for each friend
en_quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

en_quotes.quote: Friendship, like credit, is highest when it is not used
en_quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

en_quotes.quote: There is no friendship in trade
en_quotes.author: Cornelius Vanderbilt

en_quotes.quote: Don't let this music industry or any industry come between friendship. Just stay focused on your goals
en_quotes.author: Mustard

en_quotes.quote: You win the victory when you yield to friends
en_quotes.author: Sophocles

en_quotes.quote: If we are to judge of love by its consequences, it more nearly resembles hatred than friendship
en_quotes.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

en_quotes.quote: I love all girl squads. I'm all for, like, girl power and friendship, and I'm all about that
en_quotes.author: Poppy Delevingne

en_quotes.quote: In friendship as well as love, ignorance very often contributes more to our happiness than knowledge
en_quotes.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

en_quotes.quote: Friendship is Love without his wings!
en_quotes.author: Lord Byron

en_quotes.quote: Friendship often ends in love; but love in friendship - never
en_quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

en_quotes.quote: The firmest friendship is based on an identity of likes and dislikes
en_quotes.author: Sallust

en_quotes.quote: Friendship is something that is cultivated
en_quotes.author: Thalia

en_quotes.quote: The sacrifices of friendship were beautiful in her eyes as long as she was not asked to make them
en_quotes.author: Hector Hugh Munro

en_quotes.quote: Friendship is a word, the very sight of which in print makes the heart warm
en_quotes.author: Augustine Birrell

en_quotes.quote: As I grow older, I think friendship between women is a thing to cherish
en_quotes.author: Susan Glaspell

en_quotes.quote: Going through an illness and then death of a close friend has changed my attitudes to friendship enormously
en_quotes.author: Jane Green

en_quotes.quote: I have learned that to be with those I like is enough
en_quotes.author: Walt Whitman

en_quotes.quote: The differences between friends cannot but reinforce their friendship
en_quotes.author: Mao Zedong

en_quotes.quote: Friendship, like the immortality of the soul, is too good to be believed
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: Fan the sinking flame of hilarity with the wing of friendship; and pass the rosy wine
en_quotes.author: Charles Dickens

en_quotes.quote: The sincere friends of this world are as ship lights in the stormiest of nights
en_quotes.author: Giotto di Bondone

en_quotes.quote: An excellent man; he has no enemies; and none of his friends like him
en_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

en_quotes.quote: Friendship multiplies the good of life and divides the evil
en_quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

en_quotes.quote: My best friend is the man who in wishing me well wishes it for my sake
en_quotes.author: Aristotle

en_quotes.quote: A man's growth is seen in the successive choirs of his friends
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: Friendship is essentially a partnership
en_quotes.author: Aristotle

en_quotes.quote: He who hath many friends hath none
en_quotes.author: Aristotle

en_quotes.quote: Friendship without self-interest is one of the rare and beautiful things of life
en_quotes.author: James F. Byrnes

en_quotes.quote: A man cannot be said to succeed in this life who does not satisfy one friend
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: Rejoicing in our joy, not suffering over our suffering, makes someone a friend
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

en_quotes.quote: Be slow in choosing a friend, slower in changing
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

en_quotes.quote: Let there be no purpose in friendship save the deepening of the spirit
en_quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

en_quotes.quote: Your friend is your needs answered
en_quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

en_quotes.quote: Friendship has always belonged to the core of my spiritual journey
en_quotes.author: Henri Nouwen

en_quotes.quote: The friendship we share grows amidst the craggy rock pond; reeds of water spray fireflies scented with bonfires
en_quotes.author: Bradley Chicho

en_quotes.quote: You find out who your real friends are when you're involved in a scandal
en_quotes.author: Elizabeth Taylor

en_quotes.quote: A friend is what the heart needs all the time
en_quotes.author: Henry Van Dyke

en_quotes.quote: Love and friendship exclude each other
en_quotes.author: Jean de la Bruyere

en_quotes.quote: Friendship with a man is friendship with his virtue
en_quotes.author: Mencius

en_quotes.quote: The most important thing for me is to have real friendship between Egyptians and Americans
en_quotes.author: Mohammed Morsi

en_quotes.quote: Sweat makes good friendship cement
en_quotes.author: Tyne Daly

en_quotes.quote: Many a friendship, long, loyal, and self-sacrificing, rested at first on no thicker a foundation than a kind word
en_quotes.author: Frederick William Faber

en_quotes.quote: Love is rarer than genius itself. And friendship is rarer than love
en_quotes.author: Charles Peguy

en_quotes.quote: The world is round so that friendship may encircle it
en_quotes.author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

en_quotes.quote: A friend is, as it were, a second self
en_quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

en_quotes.quote: Friendship and money: oil and water
en_quotes.author: Mario Puzo

en_quotes.quote: Friendship increases in visiting friends, but in visiting them seldom
en_quotes.author: Francis Bacon

en_quotes.quote: Friendship, like love, is destroyed by long absence, though it may be increased by short intermissions
en_quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

en_quotes.quote: Friendship's the wine of life: but friendship new... is neither strong nor pure
en_quotes.author: Edward Young

en_quotes.quote: A band is a good way to break up a friendship
en_quotes.author: Julian Casablancas

en_quotes.quote: Suspicion is the cancer of friendship
en_quotes.author: Petrarch

en_quotes.quote: Madam, I have been looking for a person who disliked gravy all my life; let us swear eternal friendship
en_quotes.author: Sydney Smith

en_quotes.quote: Good fellowship and friendship are lasting, rational and manly pleasures
en_quotes.author: William Wycherley

en_quotes.quote: Our most intimate friend is not he to whom we show the worst, but the best of our nature
en_quotes.author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

en_quotes.quote: Before the flowers of friendship faded friendship faded
en_quotes.author: Gertrude Stein

en_quotes.quote: General benevolence, but not general friendship, made a man what he ought to be
en_quotes.author: Jane Austen

en_quotes.quote: How delightful to find a friend in everyone
en_quotes.author: Joseph Brodsky

en_quotes.quote: If we would build on a sure foundation in friendship, we must love friends for their sake rather than for our own
en_quotes.author: Charlotte Bronte

en_quotes.quote: Came but for friendship, and took away love
en_quotes.author: Thomas Moore

en_quotes.quote: Friendship always benefits; love sometimes injures
en_quotes.author: Seneca

en_quotes.quote: Friendship has its illusions no less than love
en_quotes.author: Stendhal

en_quotes.quote: As soon as you try to describe a close friendship, it loses something
en_quotes.author: Dean Smith

en_quotes.quote: Tis the privilege of friendship to talk nonsense, and have her nonsense respected
en_quotes.author: Charles Lamb

en_quotes.quote: Great is the victory, but the friendship of all is greater
en_quotes.author: Emil Zatopek

en_quotes.quote: Friendship is a difficult, dangerous job. It is also (though we rarely admit it) extremely exhausting
en_quotes.author: Elizabeth Bibesco

en_quotes.quote: I enjoy the time passing. I think it's a privilege to be in friendship with time
en_quotes.author: Agnes Varda

en_quotes.quote: You can never maintain a friendship if you don't tell the truth, even if it hurts
en_quotes.author: Peyton List

en_quotes.quote: Friendship is inexplicable, it should not be explained if one doesn't want to kill it
en_quotes.author: Max Jacob

en_quotes.quote: One sure way to lose another woman's friendship is to try to improve her flower arrangements
en_quotes.author: Marcelene Cox

en_quotes.quote: Plunderous is the palate I gift to you, openly I hug the universe of our friendship expanding its outer limit
en_quotes.author: Bradley Chicho

en_quotes.quote: No one person can possibly combine all the elements supposed to make up what everyone means by friendship
en_quotes.author: Francis Marion Crawford

en_quotes.quote: Friendship will not stand the strain of very much good advice for very long
en_quotes.author: Robert Staughton Lynd

en_quotes.quote: What I cannot love, I overlook. Is that real friendship?
en_quotes.author: Anais Nin

en_quotes.quote: Your experiences will be yours alone. But truth and best friendship will rarely if ever disappoint you
en_quotes.author: Anne Lamott

en_quotes.quote: Business, you know, may bring you money, but friendship hardly ever does
en_quotes.author: Jane Austen

en_quotes.quote: Marriage: A friendship recognized by the police
en_quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

en_quotes.quote: There are no rules for friendship. It must be left to itself. We cannot force it any more than love
en_quotes.author: William Hazlitt

en_quotes.quote: Bad faith likes discourse on friendship and loyalty
en_quotes.author: Mason Cooley

en_quotes.quote: A friendship that like love is warm; A love like friendship, steady
en_quotes.author: Thomas Moore

en_quotes.quote: Sixth grade was a big time, in my childhood, of hoops and friendship, and coming up with funny things
en_quotes.author: Adam Sandler

en_quotes.quote: I've learned that friendship does not equate business, business does not equate friendship
en_quotes.author: Jill Scott

en_quotes.quote: Friendship is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies
en_quotes.author: Plautus

en_quotes.quote: All you need to do to be my friend is like me
en_quotes.author: Taylor Swift

en_quotes.quote: Friendship, of itself a holy tie, is made more sacred by adversity
en_quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

en_quotes.quote: It is wise to apply the oil of refined politeness to the mechanism of friendship
en_quotes.author: Sidonie Gabrielle Colette

en_quotes.quote: Two persons cannot long be friends if they cannot forgive each other's little failings
en_quotes.author: Jean de la Bruyere

en_quotes.quote: I love life in spite of all that mars it. I love friendship, jokes and laughter
en_quotes.author: Tahar Ben Jelloun

en_quotes.quote: Laughter is not a bad beginning for a friendship, and it is the best ending for one
en_quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

en_quotes.quote: Secrecy is the chastity of friendship
en_quotes.author: Jeremy Taylor

en_quotes.quote: The best time to make friends is before you need them
en_quotes.author: Ethel Barrymore

en_quotes.quote: But it all comes down to friendship, treating people right
en_quotes.author: Ernie Banks

en_quotes.quote: To some it may be a thrill to be known, to me it's a thrill to start a friendship even up
en_quotes.author: Christopher Knight

en_quotes.quote: I always felt that the great high privilege, relief and comfort of friendship was that one had to explain nothing
en_quotes.author: Katherine Mansfield

en_quotes.quote: The ideal friendship is to feel as one while remaining two
en_quotes.author: Sophie Swetchine

en_quotes.quote: The joys of friendship inert the heart and fizzy home bouncing jubilantly with laughter-buttered love
en_quotes.author: Bradley Chicho

en_quotes.quote: Mighty proud I am that I am able to have a spare bed for my friends
en_quotes.author: Samuel Pepys

en_quotes.quote: Friendship is a strong and habitual inclination in two persons to promote the good and happiness of one another
en_quotes.author: Eustace Budgell

en_quotes.quote: Friendship is mutual blackmail elevated to the level of love
en_quotes.author: Robin Morgan

en_quotes.quote: Matching tattoos don't ensure the longevity of a friendship, any more than any other mutual hardship
en_quotes.author: Jenna Wortham

en_quotes.quote: Ultimately, it's a sense of camaraderie and friendship with local people that is core to my journeys
en_quotes.author: Tim Cope

en_quotes.quote: It's business inside the ring, but outside it, it's friendship and brotherhood. I try to do that with all my opponents
en_quotes.author: Joseph Parker

en_quotes.quote: The most deadly fruit is borne by the hatred which one grafts on an extinguished friendship
en_quotes.author: Gotthold Ephraim Lessing

en_quotes.quote: Sweet is the scene where genial friendship plays the pleasing game of interchanging praise
en_quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

en_quotes.quote: One's friends are that part of the human race with which one can be human
en_quotes.author: George Santayana

en_quotes.quote: Friendship is almost always the union of a part of one mind with the part of another; people are friends in spots
en_quotes.author: George Santayana

en_quotes.quote: You've got to reach a hand of friendship across the aisle and across philosophies in this country
en_quotes.author: Joe Biden

en_quotes.quote: Nothing so fortifies a friendship as a belief on the part of one friend that he is superior to the other
en_quotes.author: Honore de Balzac

en_quotes.quote: Friendship is an arrangement by which we undertake to exchange small favors for big ones
en_quotes.author: Montesquieu

en_quotes.quote: Establishing a friendship after divorce takes great effort and a lot of swallowing of your pride and ego
en_quotes.author: Yolanda Hadid

en_quotes.quote: We should have a good working friendship with the United States
en_quotes.author: Justin Trudeau

en_quotes.quote: When you choose your friends, don't be short-changed by choosing personality over character
en_quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

en_quotes.quote: You can always tell a real friend: when you've made a fool of yourself he doesn't feel you've done a permanent job
en_quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

en_quotes.quote: Friends are born, not made
en_quotes.author: Henry Adams

en_quotes.quote: Friendship is a disinterested commerce between equals; love, an abject intercourse between tyrants and slaves
en_quotes.author: Oliver Goldsmith

en_quotes.quote: Pity and friendship are two passions incompatible with each other
en_quotes.author: Oliver Goldsmith

en_quotes.quote: The steady discipline of intimate friendship with Jesus results in men becoming like Him
en_quotes.author: Harry Emerson Fosdick

en_quotes.quote: To want friendship is a great fault. Friendship ought to be a gratuitous joy, like the joys afforded by art or life
en_quotes.author: Simone Weil

en_quotes.quote: I'm quite obsessed with the idea of nailing the girl friendship. It's such an art, so delicate
en_quotes.author: Alanis Morissette

en_quotes.quote: Friendship is a personal issue, and it should remain that way
en_quotes.author: Prabhas

en_quotes.quote: I take friendship very seriously
en_quotes.author: Wole Soyinka

en_quotes.quote: Instead of loving your enemies - treat your friends a little better
en_quotes.author: E. W. Howe

en_quotes.quote: The little trouble in the world that is not due to love is due to friendship
en_quotes.author: E. W. Howe

en_quotes.quote: Love demands infinitely less than friendship
en_quotes.author: George Jean Nathan

en_quotes.quote: That friendship will not continue to the end which is begun for an end
en_quotes.author: Francis Quarles

en_quotes.quote: I don't think I could live with someone that I didn't have an intellectual friendship with
en_quotes.author: Jonathan Franzen

en_quotes.quote: Loyalty and friendship trumps politics for me
en_quotes.author: Robert Kraft

en_quotes.quote: All lasting business is built on friendship
en_quotes.author: Alfred A. Montapert

en_quotes.quote: Acting is about communicating, reacting, and sharing - and friendship is about all of those things, too
en_quotes.author: Diego Luna

en_quotes.quote: My definition of a friend is somebody who adores you even though they know the things you're most ashamed of
en_quotes.author: Jodie Foster

en_quotes.quote: When our weaknesses affect health and friendship, we are very much aware of their existence
en_quotes.author: Mother Angelica

en_quotes.quote: If you go to the Air and Space Museum in Washington, you can see the burn patterns on Friendship 7
en_quotes.author: John Glenn

en_quotes.quote: Friendship is one of the most tangible things in a world which offers fewer and fewer supports
en_quotes.author: Kenneth Branagh

en_quotes.quote: Caring for but never trying to own may be a further way to define friendship
en_quotes.author: William Glasser

en_quotes.quote: Whenever people reach out the hand of friendship towards me, I am not going to refuse that hand
en_quotes.author: Martin McGuinness

en_quotes.quote: That a friendship ends doesn't mean it was weak from the outset; that it ends says nothing about its importance
en_quotes.author: Rumaan Alam

en_quotes.quote: Show me a genuine case of platonic friendship, and I shall show you two old or homely faces
en_quotes.author: Austin O'Malley

en_quotes.quote: I only understand friendship or scorched earth
en_quotes.author: Roger Ailes

en_quotes.quote: I wanted to show platonic friendship between men and women, because I think it is underutilised in fiction
en_quotes.author: Gail Honeyman

en_quotes.quote: To like and dislike the same things, this is what makes a solid friendship
en_quotes.author: Sallust

en_quotes.quote: Time makes friendship stronger, but love weaker
en_quotes.author: Jean de la Bruyere

en_quotes.quote: No one works with an actor or a director for friendship
en_quotes.author: Govinda

en_quotes.quote: Like any friendship or marriage, familiarity breeds more contempt, and love, and everything
en_quotes.author: Martin Freeman

en_quotes.quote: If I'm right, the only reason our species is still around is because of our friendship with the canines
en_quotes.author: W. Bruce Cameron

en_quotes.quote: I lend people money, but I'd never lend something that would jeopardise a friendship if I didn't get it back
en_quotes.author: Paloma Faith

en_quotes.quote: I not only enjoy a really great friendship with both my girls but also a close mother-daughter bond as well
en_quotes.author: Tina Knowles

en_quotes.quote: There has to be chemistry in a duet, but if you go beyond the point of friendship and attraction, you lose something
en_quotes.author: Kenny Rogers

en_quotes.quote: Our friends interpret the world and ourselves to us, if we take them tenderly and truly
en_quotes.author: Amos Bronson Alcott

en_quotes.quote: A friendship between Germany and Israel didn't always seem natural
en_quotes.author: Reuven Rivlin

en_quotes.quote: I think friendship in football is a massive part of the team
en_quotes.author: Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain

en_quotes.quote: Pak-China friendship is higher than Himalayas, deeper than ocean, sweeter than honey, and stronger than steel
en_quotes.author: Shehbaz Sharif

en_quotes.quote: CPEC is an epoch-making project going to put Pakistan-China friendship and their economic cooperation to new heights
en_quotes.author: Shehbaz Sharif

en_quotes.quote: Nobody ever chooses the already unfortunate as objects of his loyal friendship
en_quotes.author: Lucan

en_quotes.quote: Friendship and sentiment and the giving of one's words are very important
en_quotes.author: Michael Cimino

en_quotes.quote: Any friendship or relationship is about a language
en_quotes.author: Gina Bellman

en_quotes.quote: You can't build anything with a flimsy foundation. Friendship is the foundation
en_quotes.author: Hill Harper

en_quotes.quote: Some people are willing to betray years of friendship just to get a little bit of the spotlight
en_quotes.author: Lauren Conrad

en_quotes.quote: I like friendship
en_quotes.author: Juergen Teller

en_quotes.quote: Friendship brings in a lot of honesty and trust into any relationship, especially a marriage
en_quotes.author: Farhan Akhtar

en_quotes.quote: Dil Chahta Hai' is not the first film about friendship. 'Lakshya' is not the first film about war and coming of age
en_quotes.author: Farhan Akhtar

en_quotes.quote: There's nothing that makes me cry and laugh more than stories about friendship
en_quotes.author: Phoebe Waller-Bridge

en_quotes.quote: My friendship with the great actor and director Alan Rickman did not have a particularly auspicious start
en_quotes.author: Katharine Viner

en_quotes.quote: Blunders, no, only friendship binds us to honesty - attracting crypts of mushrooms in the wake of our snowboards
en_quotes.author: Bradley Chicho

en_quotes.quote: India-Seychelles relations have been characterized by close friendship, understanding and cooperation
en_quotes.author: Pratibha Patil

en_quotes.quote: The rare few, who, early in life have rid themselves of the friendship of the many
en_quotes.author: James Whistler

en_quotes.quote: I have a very close friendship with the skaters
en_quotes.author: Eric Heiden

en_quotes.quote: Aristotle uses a mother's love for her child as the prime example of love or friendship
en_quotes.author: Mortimer Adler

en_quotes.quote: I definitely have guys that I'm friends with that I have a crush on, and you don't want to ruin the friendship
en_quotes.author: Miranda Cosgrove

en_quotes.quote: Friendship formed in the glamour industry comes with mutual benefits, which is nice, but it is not the real deal
en_quotes.author: Mohit Chauhan

en_quotes.quote: Stop using the word 'bromance.' Can we please kill that stupid term? We're just friends. It's called friendship!
en_quotes.author: Blake Shelton

en_quotes.quote: Friends confront each other sometimes, and sometimes the friendship lasts, and sometimes it doesn't
en_quotes.author: Brooke Elliott

en_quotes.quote: I think quite a lot of people have a friendship or a love that's gone like that and it never quite reconciles properly
en_quotes.author: Tim Finn

en_quotes.quote: I think friendship is more important than love, but that love that grows out of friendship is the very best of all
en_quotes.author: Jane Green

en_quotes.quote: When you start a relationship, there's part of the friendship that dies - you can never go back
en_quotes.author: Emily Bett Rickards

en_quotes.quote: Accountability in friendship is the equivalent of love without strategy
en_quotes.author: Anita Brookner

en_quotes.quote: Love and esteem are the first principles of friendship; it is always imperfect if either of these two are wanting
en_quotes.author: Eustace Budgell

en_quotes.quote: Silences make the real conversations between friends. Not the saying but the never needing to say is what counts
en_quotes.author: Margaret Lee Runbeck

en_quotes.quote: I want to sing of humanity, friendship, what's happening to the Earth and the like
en_quotes.author: Shankar Mahadevan

en_quotes.quote: My films are always concerned with family, friendship, honor, and patriotism
en_quotes.author: John Woo

en_quotes.quote: There is nothing like mortal fear to galvanize a friendship
en_quotes.author: Andrew Lincoln

en_quotes.quote: I haven't expressed this too much in public, but I have a friendship to a degree with Bruce Springsteen
en_quotes.author: Elias

en_quotes.quote: I've got many close friends, but there's an awful lot about friendship that is not demonstrative in my case
en_quotes.author: Warren Christopher

en_quotes.quote: My characters have never waged a war against any gender. They are all about friendship and being loyal to your friends
en_quotes.author: Kartik Aaryan

en_quotes.quote: Separating your profession from friendship is very difficult
en_quotes.author: Lyoto Machida

en_quotes.quote: Friendship and loyalty shouldn't come in the way of casting
en_quotes.author: Sanjay Leela Bhansali

en_quotes.quote: Henley's one of my favorite singers. I've maintained a friendship with Don over the years
en_quotes.author: Steve Lukather

en_quotes.quote: Usually, you don't have commitment promises in a friendship. Usually, it just grows
en_quotes.author: Sheila Heti

en_quotes.quote: There is no friendship out there. When you race, you have to fight. That's it
en_quotes.author: Niki Lauda

en_quotes.quote: You can be really romantic and put a lot of effort into friendship
en_quotes.author: Beanie Feldstein

en_quotes.quote: My favorite thing about 'Superbad' is it values male friendship
en_quotes.author: Beanie Feldstein

en_quotes.quote: The Disaster Artist' isn't really about 'The Room.' It's about friendship and how dreams can come true
en_quotes.author: Greg Sestero

en_quotes.quote: I would like to raise my glass to friendship between Russia and the United States
en_quotes.author: Richard Lugar

en_quotes.quote: Even where friendship is concerned, it takes me a long time to trust people
en_quotes.author: Namie Amuro

en_quotes.quote: Likings arise when one has no earthly reason for liking - the most wildly improbable marriages and uncommon friendship
en_quotes.author: Patrick O'Brian

en_quotes.quote: Lovers have a right to betray you... friends don't
en_quotes.author: Judy Holliday

en_quotes.quote: Restoration of friendship with Russia, our biggest neighbor, is necessary for our peace and economy
en_quotes.author: Bidzina Ivanishvili

en_quotes.quote: I really enjoy writing about female friendship. It's an endlessly interesting dynamic for me
en_quotes.author: Ruth Ware

en_quotes.quote: But, based on my friendship with Evie as young mothers, I started going on freedom rides in 1966
en_quotes.author: June Jordan

en_quotes.quote: If one of two lovers is loyal, and the other jealous and false, how may their friendship last, for Love is slain!
en_quotes.author: Marie de France

en_quotes.quote: It's so great to be able to express the friendship between men
en_quotes.author: Park Hyung-sik

en_quotes.quote: My reputation is too important to put it aside for purposes of some friendship. We have a job to do
en_quotes.author: Stephanie Tubbs Jones

en_quotes.quote: I'm loyal, and I like my friends. Friendship enriches your life and makes it more interesting
en_quotes.author: Wendi Deng Murdoch

en_quotes.quote: I really wasn't even aware that Batman and Superman had this kind of grudging friendship
en_quotes.author: Mark Valley

en_quotes.quote: Although the troops have struck us, we throw it all behind and are glad to meet you in peace and friendship
en_quotes.author: Black Kettle

en_quotes.quote: Friendship! Mysterious cement of the soul, Sweet'ner of life, and solder of society
en_quotes.author: Robert Blair

en_quotes.quote: One of the great things personally coming to Hawai'i is my friendship of Jim Nicholson
en_quotes.author: Dan Fouts

en_quotes.quote: Marriage, for a woman at least, hampers the two things that made life to me glorious - friendship and learning
en_quotes.author: Jane Harrison

en_quotes.quote: Richard Donner's friendship and guidance showed me that there's more to life than being an actor
en_quotes.author: Jeff Cohen

en_quotes.quote: Never be afraid to meet to the hilt the demand of either work, or friendship - two of life's major assets
en_quotes.author: Eleanor Robson Belmont

en_quotes.quote: I hope to continue my friendship with France and its filmmakers for many years to come
en_quotes.author: Harvey Weinstein
